accelerator_simulation_codes: This is a list of accelerator simulation codes in the community.

codes.title: Bmad
codes.subtitle: An object oriented, open source, subroutine library for relativistic charged-particle dynamics simulations in accelerators and storage rings

codes.title: Warp
codes.subtitle: A particle-in-cell (PIC) framework designed to simulate high current particle beams and plasmas
codes.description: Warp incorporates a variety of integrated physics models and extensive diagnostics. The PIC method is implemented in axisymmetric, transverse-slice, and fully three-dimensional modes.
codes.publication: A. Friedman, R. H. Cohen, D. P. Grote, S. M. Lund, W. M. Sharp, J.-L. Vay, I. Haber, and R. A. Kishek, 'Computational Methods in the Warp Code Framework for Kinetic Simulations of Particle Beams and Plasmas,' IEEE Trans. Plasma Sci. vol. 42, no. 5, p. 1321 (May 2014)

codes.title: MaryLie/IMPACT
codes.subtitle: Lie algebraic beam dynamics code with space charge
codes.description: MaryLie/IMPACT (ML/I) combines features of MaryLie and IMPACT along with other features including a MAD-like front end
